My First Blog Post

Welcome to my blog! This is your first post.

Getting Started

Here are some tips to get you started:

  1. Replace this post with your own content
  2. Add your own styling in src/css/style.css
  3. Create more posts in the src/posts/ directory

Next Steps

  • Write your first real blog post
  • Customize the layout and styling
  • Deploy your blog to Netlify, Vercel, or GitHub Pages

Happy blogging!
